channel.title: Songs About Mutants
channel.description:
So, in class we read this horrid book titled, The Chrysalids.
Our assignment now is to write a "sound track" for the book. We need to pick 10 songs and explain how line(s) from this song relate to the book.
So, I need some songs related to mutants or mutations.
I need 10 in total, so as much help as i can get would be amazing.
Thanks guys!

item.title: Songs About Mutants
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Death - Living Monstrosity

Every day blows by in a world of corrupt addiction With life comes pain withdrawals and deformation Breaking the mould human appearance Contorting bodies with chamical interference

The guilty one, innocent she now cries
A life of hell, better off to die
Born without eyes, hands, and a half a brain
Being born addicted to cocaine

Living monstrosity
A freak for life they’ll always be
Never knowing love or hate
Only pain the drug creates

Some say she’s naive, she’s a stupid bitch
Some say to forgive, guilty she should die

The beginning of the end begins at birth
Breeding masses of twisted screaming flesh
An example we should make out of theses creators of misfortune
A serious crime that should not be forgiven

The guilty one, innocent she now cries
A life of hell, better off to die
Born without eyes, hands, and a half a brain
Being born addicted to cocaine

Especially the highlighted lines could be useful i 'spose. The song’s about a mother giving birth to a baby while she’s addicated to cocaine. The baby’s the living monstrosity.

Perhaps you could throw in Death’s Leprosy as well, not too sure about that one though.

Read full topic

item.title: Songs About Mutants
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:340476”]Aerials by SOAD could relate, its about being different and circus freaks which usually suffer from some form of mutation.[/quote]Used it, thanks.

I just made up like 6 of them, the teacher isn’t going to be listening to the songs…we just need to provide a few lines from the lyrics.

So, solved I suppose?

Read full topic

item.title: Songs About Mutants
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Heroes in a half-shell Turtle power!

They’re the world’s most fearsome fighting team (We’re really hip!)
They’re heroes in a half-shell and they’re green (Hey - get a grip!)
When the evil Shredder attacks
These Turtle boys don’t cut him no slack!

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

Splinter taught them to be ninja teens (He’s a radical rat!)
Leonardo leads, Donatello does machines (That’s a fact, Jack!)
Raphael is cool but crude (Gimme a break!)
Michaelangelo is a party dude (Party!)

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Heroes in a half shell
Turtle power!

Read full topic

have fun getting an A
